Class FilterSettings

java.lang.Object
utils.filter.FilterSettings
public class FilterSettings extends Object
Reusable component to store filter settings for internship listings. Settings persist across menu page navigation. Maintains state for status, major, level, date ranges, company, keyword filters, and sort order.
Since:
2025-11-16
Version:
1.0
Author:
NTU SC2002 Group

  • Constructor Details

    • FilterSettings

      public FilterSettings()
      Constructs a FilterSettings with default values. Initializes with no filters and alphabetical sort order.

  • Method Details

    • reset

      public void reset()
      Resets all filters to default values. Clears all filter criteria and restores alphabetical sort order.

    • getStatusFilter

      public InternshipStatus getStatusFilter()
      Gets the status filter enum value.
      Returns:
      the status filter (enum)

    • setStatusFilter

      public void setStatusFilter(InternshipStatus status)
      Sets the status filter using enum value.
      Parameters:
      status - The status to filter by (null to clear)

    • setStatusFilterStr

      public void setStatusFilterStr(String statusStr)
      Sets the status filter using string value. Supports special filters like "AVAILABLE" or "FILLED".
      Parameters:
      statusStr - The status string to filter by (null to clear)

    • setMajorFilter

      public void setMajorFilter(String major)
      Sets the major filter.
      Parameters:
      major - The major to filter by (null to clear)

    • setLevelFilter

      public void setLevelFilter(String level)
      Sets the level filter.
      Parameters:
      level - The level to filter by (null to clear)

    • setOpeningDateFilter

      public void setOpeningDateFilter(LocalDate date)
      Sets the opening date filter (minimum date).
      Parameters:
      date - The minimum opening date (null to clear)

    • setClosingDateFilter

      public void setClosingDateFilter(LocalDate date)
      Sets the closing date filter (maximum date).
      Parameters:
      date - The maximum closing date (null to clear)

    • setCompanyFilter

      public void setCompanyFilter(String company)
      Sets the company filter.
      Parameters:
      company - The company to filter by (null to clear)

    • setKeywordFilter

      public void setKeywordFilter(String keyword)
      Sets the keyword filter. Empty strings are treated as null.
      Parameters:
      keyword - The keyword to filter by (null to clear)

    • setSortOrder

      public void setSortOrder(String order)
      Sets the sort order.
      Parameters:
      order - The sort order (e.g., "ALPHABETICAL", "ID", "CLOSING_DATE")

    • hasActiveFilters

      public boolean hasActiveFilters()
      Checks if any filters are currently active.
      Returns:
      true if at least one filter is set, false otherwise

    • getFilterSummary

      public String getFilterSummary()
      Gets a human-readable summary of active filters.
      Returns:
      Summary string describing all active filters
